room_title: Escape room "Pirate Tavern" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Our extended family of 9 people, ranging in age from 15 to 55 had a great time! The Pirate room was very fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Tavern" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: We escaped the pirate room with just seconds left. The room was fun and challenging. Will likely go back to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Tavern" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: I live right down the street but just found out about this place a week ago. Went to check out the Pirate room. Definitely want more than 2 people for that one, we got pretty far but didn't quite finish. It was an absolute blast, regardless... the production quality was fantastic and the entire experience was very immersive. I'll definitely be back to try one of the other rooms another time.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Tavern" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Our boys, my wife and I had a blast the other day - what a great family outing before sending the kids back to school! Didn't escape, but we were so close! Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Tavern" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: I had an absolutely incredible time at Trapped! The puzzle was fun and much more difficult than I expected, but our group made it out of the pirate tavern just in time. 10/10 I will absolutely be coming back.
